metadata.name: In the World of Desire
metadata.description:
This work tells us strange and dangerous things about the complex emotions and feelings that desire can produce. As a human feeling, desire is present throughout our existence. In many occasions, it often seems a harmless feeling, inevitable and even necessary.
But desire and its negative side is in this work, the point of interest. Once again, it is a female character who is the thread of a scene that illustrates an inner reality. Are desires the engine of our lives? Can desires lead us to be better people? 
When we remain too long under the cloak of desire we find such dangerous feelings as frustration, boredom or lack of faith in ourselves.
In this piece we glimpse a kind of paradise. It is the apparently happy character, however, there are two elements of negative symbolism that appear as part of the scenery. The first is the liquid in which the character is submerged...and which subtly deforms his image as his time in that world becomes longer.
The second element is the mechanical
